message: Let's be fair, Bob. I get $60, you get $40. What do you say?
I'll take $60, and you can have $40.  Seems like a fair trade to me!
Okay Bob, let's be a bit more realistic. I'll take $55, you get $45.  Time is ticking, and the pot is shrinking!
I'm going to up my offer, Alice. You've lost some of your share due to inflation, so I'm giving you $30. Let's end this quickly, or we'll both lose everything!
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  Let's split it down the middle, 50/50, and call it a day before we both lose out!
